src:
Sempat Pamit, Elon Musk Ngetweet Lagi
06 Nov 2019, 07:05 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: Twitter/Istimewa

Jakarta - Sepertinya tren pamit untuk kembali ke media sosial menular ke Elon Musk. Baru beberapa hari lalu dia mengumumkan akan offline, kini CEO Space X dan Tesla itu sudah ngetweet lagi.Dalam kicauan terbarunya, Elon memperlihatkan video kesuksesan uji parasut Crew Dragon. Dia pun memberikan penjelasan singkat terkait uji coba tersebut."Agar jelas, kami hanya melakukan 1 uji multi-parasut dari desain Mk3, jadi 9 lagi tersisa untuk mencapai 10 tes yang sukses berturut-turut," tulisnya.Tidak hanya itu, pria 48 tahun ini pun sempat membalas kicauan dari netizen yang merespon postingannya.



Semoga saja setelah empat hari Elon mendapatkan istirahat yang cukup dari media sosial dan kembali rutin posting terutama meme-meme lucu.Diberitakan sebelumnya Elon Musk mengumumkan dia akan 'offline' dari Twitter. Pengumuman ini disampaikan Elon pada Jumat (1/11) melalui sebuah cuitan yang ditujukan langsung kepada 29 juta follower di media sosial berlogo burung tersebut.Satu jam sebelum berpamitan, dia sempat memposting tweet terpisah yang mengatakan bahwa dirinya tidak yakin apakah Twitter baik atau tidak. Lalu, dia menambahkan forum Reddit masih bagus, mengacu pada situs grup diskusi populer.Tidak diketahui alasan pasti Elon memutuskan untuk istirahat bermain Twitter. Tidak pula diketahui, apakah keputusan ini selamanya atau hanya sementara. Namun yang jelas, Elon tidak sampai menghapus akun Twitter-nya. Simak Video "Nadiem Jadi Mendikbud, Netizen: Pelajaran Sesuai Aplikasi"[Gambas:Video 20detik](afr/afr)
text:
Goodbye, Elon Musk Tweet again
Nov 6 2019, 07:05 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: Twitter / Special

Jakarta - It seems like the farewell trend to return to social media is transmitted to Elon Musk. Just a few days ago he announced that he would go offline, now CEO of Space X and Tesla had tweeted again. In his latest tweet, Elon showed a video of the success of the Crew Dragon parachute test. He also gave a brief explanation regarding the trial. "To be clear, we only conducted 1 multi-parachute test of the Mk3 design, so 9 more are left to achieve 10 successful tests in a row," he wrote. Not only that, 48-year-old man this also had time to reply to the tweet from netizens who responded to his post.



Hopefully, after four days Elon get enough rest from social media and return to routine posting, especially funny memes. It was reported earlier that Elon Musk announced he would be 'offline' from Twitter. This announcement was delivered by Elon on Friday (1/11) through a tweet addressed directly to 29 million followers on social media bearing the bird logo. One hour before saying goodbye, he had posted a separate tweet saying that he was not sure whether Twitter was good or not. Then, he added the Reddit forum was still good, referring to the popular discussion group site. There is no known reason why Elon decided to break playing Twitter. It is also unknown whether this decision is forever or only temporary. But what is clear, Elon not to delete his Twitter account. Check out the video "Nadiem Becomes Minister of Education and Culture, Netizens: Lessons According to Applications" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (afr / afr)
